content.detailedDescription: In my mother-in-laws driveway smoking, looked up, saw three orangish lights trailing one another, not a straight flight path, slightly wavering, going relativly slow, then go straight up into cloud cover, then about 15 seconds later a forth one followed the same path and went up in the same area as the first three
content.summary: Overall 4 objects coming from nw to se then going into space above lakeland

content.detailedDescription: We were out camping on a native reservation in bruce county. we sitting by the camp fire when a native who was fishing down by the river approximately 100-200 yards away came yelling saying to look up at the sky. i looked up over the field and saw 4 lights by then 2 of them had disappeared since the native had yelled to look at the lights. i quickly turned around and started calling over more people, in total maybe 8 people saw it from my point of view. this is a second time these lights were viewed over this area, but last time only one person saw it. i knew right away it was a ufo because the only airport around was 20km away and only have cessna planes in there fleet and occasionally a canadian coast guard helicopter which is bright orange flies over and an air rescue from the hospital. but there has never been more then 3 aircraft in the air at that altitude. the objects just disappeared 1 by one and soon they were all gone.
content.summary: Was 6 lights at first and in a few second 4 then 2 and then none

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside at home, in the country. i was observing the stars and sky, it was before sunset. for maybe 10 seconds i observed a green object with a lighter outside, the outside a turned orange/yellow as it descended. it appeared as if it were a plane crashing, on fire. but, it was green at first, so, i kno it was not .From where i was at, maybe lake michigan it crashed or landed in. but im not sure. i at first thought it was  plane crashing. it was not. the whole incedent was onlylike fifteen seconds. i know what i seen, i was not fearful at all, but amazed. my sighting was enough to report, i was amazed and want to kno more...
content.summary: Green ball with white outer, the outer turned orange as it descended

content.detailedDescription: My wife spotted the object first --- we were in our lounge chairs in our yard observing the clouds because it had stormed off and on all day and the formations were interesting and pretty --- i thought it might be a satellite --- it was round and moved out of cloud cover on a straight line --- we were waiting for the sun to stop reflecting off the object so we could make out what it was but it wasn't the sun's reflection --- the light being given off by the object was its own --- the object disappeared into the distance --- i felt like maybe this was the first ufo i have ever seen
content.summary: Bright light in day time sky

content.detailedDescription: Took photo of severe storm. nothing was visible to the eye. didnt notice "lights" until later when looking at pic.
content.summary: Picture taken during severe storm

content.detailedDescription:
We just saw 6 of this spheres or balls .. they are black following a north path . we get to see 6 of them with a 5 min interval between. .. 
too far and still visible to naked eye to be a party balloon.
i used my telescope visor to find what it was but still cant see exactly any definition. 
hope to find more pp looking at the sky and seeing this
content.summary: Black sphere or ball

content.detailedDescription:
William hornbostel
may 7,2013
i had gone outside to smoke a cigarette. i was looking up at the stars when i thought to myself "is that star moving?" i was looking at a spot in the sky where there were 3 stars in a triangle pattern, the top right star all of a sudden started moving.I looked away then back to refocus and realized that it was moving,off to the right. after a fer seconds it just disappeared. i didn't see any clouds at all and thought it was strange but it must have been a satellite. but right after it disappeared i noticed another one moving in the same direction same same level as if it were following the first one and disappeared just about the same spot. i thought to myself there is no way that that was a plane,or a satellite. i had never seen 2 satellites following each other before.I don't recall any color and they were not blinking,they looked just like all the other stars in the sky. i text ed my roommate to tell him that's how i got the time. the next day i was at work and i found a post from someone online that i believe saw the same thing. ufo blogger site i think.So i pulled up a map and tried to investigate a bit.I do believe i was looking in the direction of alpine texas n.W. and although the details were not exactly the same i do think we saw the same event. oh yeah and i had gone inside and posted it on facebook that night as well.The post is still there

case number	47268
log number	us-05082013-0015
date submitted	 05/08/2013 11:17 utc
date of the event	 05/07/2013 10:15 utc
source	 mufon
disposition	 unresolved
summary	 2 blinking red lights seemed about 1/4to1/2 mile apart then faded away. i observed nearly 3 minutes, but they were already there when i went outside.City	alpine
region	texas
country	united states
latitude	30.363798
longitude	-103.71
content.summary: I was outside smoking a cig.Looking up at the big dipper turned to my left and s aw 3 stars in a triangle pattern and one started moving  after a minute just disappeared,but then i noticed another one

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 1:05 a.M. and had been on facebook. i poked my head out the patio door to listen to the mockingbird that was singing. i was taken aback by this very bright rectangular light in the distance. i live on the golf course tee and it looked to be at about the putting hole. 

my first thought was, "what's that doing there?". it was a large, vertical, rectangular object that was brightly lit as if with led lights. it seemed to have the structure of a box kite. there were some secondary lights on the edges (or coming from within) that looked a little reddish/bluish and projected off of it... kind of starry and flickery. like if you were squinting at a led yard light. but this was up in the air about 100 to 500 feet. 

it appeared to travel closer and looked about the size of a semi truck trailer when it stopped a few hundred feet from me. i had turned off the patio light and walked into the yard to observe it at different angles. when it got closer i realized it was not something normal and i wanted to take a picture. by the time i got my cell phone and came back out (15 seconds)it was gone. it didn't appear to have passed by my house as i looked in other directions.

it made no noise and my two dogs and the noisy mockingbird were totally unaware. i never felt threatened just dumbstruck over what seemed to be hovering in front of me. it made no more sense to me than if i had seen a large billboard "floating" over the golf course in the middle of the day!

this is my first time to see something like this. i do believe in the possibility of ufos but never expected this to happen to me. this morning i am trying to find an explanation or dismiss it as a trick of the eye. but i just can't get over how strong it's presence was. big, bright and so quiet!
content.summary: Rectangular structure like a vertical box kite with bright lighted surface and small flickering light points.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at the stars near boston harbar, was a clear night, spotten north star, little dipper, was looking for big dipper. noticed very bright star, watched it move slowly across the sky, changed directions, went from going north to straight up, object disappeared into space.
content.summary: noticed very bright "star" move slowly across the sky, changed directions (went from going north to straight up) disappeared into space

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While outside, near or at sunset, facing south+/-, looking for orion, i noticed a faint point of light that seemed to be moving near where i thought the constellation should be. as i watched, the object flickered and began a rapid acceleration away from the patch of sky i was watching and disappeared over the mountains to the southwest. a short time later, in the same general area, after orion's belt became visible, a similar pinpoint of light (faint star-like) caught my attention, but closer to directly south of my location. again, it flickered and moved away at a seemingly impossible speed, leaving a faint streak as it accelerated. this same type of "light" appeared over and over, in more or less the same general area of the sky for an extended period of time, each time ending with the light flickering slightly then accelerating away at fantastic speed until i lost sight of them.

although not shown in the check boxes above (because the options you offer do not cover the general observations i observed) i noticed the same thing happening in nearly every sector of the sky, around the clock, only during the day they are much more visible (provided the sky is not cloudy) and the objects are easily visible to the naked eye if you know where and when to look. the flashes during the day are as bright as a flash bulb going off and i can see the distortion of the air around the objects, then, when several are in formation, they all fly off at a high volocity.

i have been watching this happen now for about two weeks and have noticed that there are several maneuvers the objects make that i had not noticed before; as a formation moves away, it will stop briefly then accelerate at a right angle, dip slightly at which time several of the objects in the formation will sling-shot away from the main body of formation, often in different directions but most often straight up, showing a faint trail/tail of light behind each, each exceeding the altitude of the previous object until there are 5, 6, or 7 tiers high, then the entire formation accelerates away in the new direction at unbelievable speed leaving a disturbance in the atmosphere that can be seen by the naked eye. i have tracked them orbiting the laveen area while i put a laser on them until i get too dizzy to keep up, then they jet away -- out of sight. (when i put the laser on them, they don't leave until i stop tracking them with the beam). this has been happening around the clock as far as i can tell and i have counted as many as one craft per second materializing and joining a formation, then going into the above described behavior over and over again; the highest number i have counted in one formation is 20 before it started moving away and i lost count.

my sightings are not limited to just laveen/south phoenix; i have observed them in north phoenix, the west valley, the apache junction area and over the reservation to the south of phoenix. when viewed from the side at a distance, i can make out an actual vessel above the distortion. in addition, i have now noticed that this same activity has been captured on video where the subject being filmed is outdoors with a lot of sky in the background, on television. i have captured these activities myself on a small kodak ten mp still/video camera from my back yard (video files attached). i do not have the expertise or software/hardware to edit the clarity or contrast of the footage, but someone with the right equipment and software can clean it up and make the objects stand out better. please note that the time/date stamp on the files is off because the battery went dead and i did not reset the time and date on the camera.

if you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at the number above.

kind regards
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Chevron,   Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Small, star-like flash, brilliant large flash, orangish form appears, distortion/auora masks, then manouvers away in groups of 5 or more

content.detailedDescription: Low flying orb fly's over my house with 6 witnesses then appeared at the same time a week later. it looked like a flame
content.summary: Low flying orb august

content.detailedDescription:
I was ridding my bike to go to the store to get something to eat when i stopped my bike to take a breather. i looked up and i saw this very big triangle shaped object headed ne  it was going really slow and was moving over a building. 
 
i was shocked to have witnessed  a ufo  flying so slowly i thought to my self i better get out of the area but something made me stay like it was important so i stayed  until i couldn't see the object anymore
content.summary: Very big triangle shaped object

content.detailedDescription: It appeared to come straight up to the east of us and then shot off fast is the west slowing down speeding up. then it stopped and hovered  to the east and started upward and vanished
content.summary: Rose fast to the east hovered and shot off fast to the west

content.detailedDescription: It appeared to come straight up to the east of us and then shot off fast is the west slowing down speeding up. then it stopped and hovered  to the east and started upward and vanished
content.summary: Rose fast to the east hovered and shot off fast to the west

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Sighting of unusual lights may 9th, 2013, approximately 8:45 pm on highway 66 in central florida traveling from tampa, st. petersburg area to sebring. 

i was driving east on the dark two lane highway route 66 with in 20 miles of sebring, according to the ���never lost��� nav. data screen. some lite traffic shared the road with me traveling about 60 miles per hour.  i came around a tree lined curve in the road and suddenly caught a glimpse of a large orange light at what seamed to me to be just above the tree tops to my left. i noticed one light dropping or separating from the light above it. these lights were large orange lights.
to best describe the size and shape of these lights, i will say they appear to be similar to, but larger than the lights of a large commercial aircraft landing headlights that turn on as jets approach runways for landing, at close range. roughly 10 times large than the oncoming traffic headlights. my first thought was that a small plane was on fire, falling out of the sky and breaking apart into pieces and about to crash into the forest next to the road, except that the lights disappeared  as i noticed them and there was no sound of a plane.  when i first noticed the lights they seam to be getting brighter then a second later they were fading out, as they separated from each other, with one light dropping below the other, then two visible lights disappearing.

i thought that this was odd, as i scanned my rear view window to see if i heard or saw anything else i  wondered if any one else saw what i saw. 

i continued to drive on about another 10 minutes. my never lost nav. read out said 11 miles to sebring with a straight stretch of dark road in front of me and one blue van traveling about 1/16 of a mile in front of me, maybe one car about the same distance behind me.

at about 9:00 pm straight in front of me about 45 degrees on the horizon at approximately 750 to 1000 feet above me , about ��� mile away ( hard to estimate?) i saw a bright orange light pop on, same as i had seen 10 minutes earlier. it just began to appear first small then large and larger until it was very bright like something was turning on, or powering up, and then it dimmed down and disappeared completely. it had my attention. then a second later a second light below the first and a little to the right  seamed to also fired up to a familiar bright flare and then dimmed down. this pattern repeated it self again as i was scanning the side of the road trying to navigate the size of the shoulder to pull over. unfortunately a very narrow gravel shoulder and dark descending grassy embankment left me no option to pull over with traffic approaching behind me. i assessed i could cause an accident or lose control of the car if i tried to quickly pull over so i just slowed down and continued to watch the sky as this second pattern of each light turning on, flaring up, and dimming down repeated itself. just then a third light appeared even further to the right.  at about the same height and did the same flair up and dim down expression. then all of the sudden there were 7 to 9 lights coming on all in a symphony in front of me, fairing up in varied stages, not at starting at the same second but with in seconds of each other, each flaring in a random pattern in front of me, then they started to move as some blinked on and off while they appeared to dance with each other in what impressed me as a joyous playful dance with each other.  i had the feeling that the lights knew i saw them and the lights interacted with each other in an intentional way. 
it did not seam to me to be a single large object with lights moving around on its surface, but it was very dark. i could see random stars in the sky after these bright lights dimed out.  this whole dancing lights sighting only lasted about one minute, with all the lights fading out quickly.  it has taken me far longer to write this recall  of the sightings than it took for me to experience the events. 

i continued to scan the sky for additional orange lights but saw none. i did see something else unusual as i continued to drive east toward sebring. i saw what look like a dotted line of small white lights in a strobe fashion blinking in a long skinny line changing direction across a section of the sky straight in front of me.  frist moving right to left then left to right. this happened repeatedly for several minutes as i drove.  this was ongoing and the lights were very dim white lights. this seamed odd as well but so much less significant to what i had just seen i dismissed it as insignificant.

with 10 minutes of the large orange light sighting, i arrived at the hotel i was staying at for a ufo conference hosted by paola harris in sebring florida.  as i drove into the parking lot i saw a group of people standing out side looking up and i suspected they could have see what i just saw. so as i passed them i rolled down my window and shouted ���did any of you just see a large display of large orange lights���? one woman and her husband saw the same event minutes earlier. they saw large orange lights as they were walking out side the chateau elan hotel adjacent to the sebring raceway.
content.summary: I saw two incidents of large unexplainable orange lights in the sky while driving across central florida.

content.detailedDescription:
I was indoors when i heard my older sister and her best friend calling me frantically. (i am 61 and my sister is 63. her best friend is about our age...) i thought someone had fallen down or something similar...When i got to where they were, outside on a patio deck connected to the house - i could now hear clearly what they were yelling. they were saying, ufo, look!!! a ufo look...!!! 
when i looked at what they were pointing to, i was sort of disappointed because i was expecting a saucer of something that was solid. instead, what i say confused me because i remember saying to myself, 'how are they doing that?' what i was looking at appeared to be a roller coaster ride up in the sky about 50 feet above the distant treeline.
a roller coaster ride though has a beginning and an end which i couldn't see. when this 'roller coaster' just kept traveling, i thought - wait a minute, that's not possible...This was an inner dialogue that i was having as i'm watching the objects and the time that this took for me to realize something was 'wrong' was about 10 seconds.
the objects were reddish orange balls and seemed to be in groups of 4-6 connected in groups that were part of a 'train' that undulate up and down and i think initially seemed to emit a glow like trail inside or part of each group of balls..As i've said, they were going up and down, side-ways and moving in a direction - very much like a roller coaster would, except much more exaggerated as they got closer, or moved in a direction.
the first appearance seemed to originate from patchogue, coming from the south shore. this train of balls or roller coaster lights moved slightly west, towards us...
i ran downstairs to the basement and retrieved a digital camera, ran back up and started to nervously taking photos. they seemed to slow down and spread apart always moving - except for a few seconds. some of the lights seemed to freeze as i was taking pictures. they regrouped after a few seconds and continued in a north, north easterly direction - until the lights seemed to fade out or just turn off...
i would say that they seemed to maintain a general altitude of about 100 ft and they were about one mile away. hard to say...Whatever it was had an order or control or intelligence that seemed 'special' and flew with a purpose of some type.
it was a clear night and we could see at least two commercial airliners flying in the sky during the time we were seeing these objects. the commercial jets that we saw looked primitive compared to how these other objects traveled. our jets flew much slow, blue lights blinking and in straight lines.
although i was very nervous i did take at least 3 or 4 photos which i will include. i called 911 and i was instructed to call some government agency that dealt with reports of terrestrial air plane problems. i forget the agency name. i called them and gave them this story but i gave some inaccurate info. i told the guy that the objects were heading in a southwesterly direction instead of north, north easterly direction. he took the info and said thank you and good bye.
content.summary: At first seemed to be a 'floating roller coaster ride' in the sky but the red dots that seemed to have some form of connectedness just kept going northwesterly direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a california state licensed branch 3 (wdo inspector #43953), or better known as a "termite" inspector. i take pix during my inspections to document my findings so later when i write my report, i can go back & review. i was in hacienda heights just finishing my inspection. later (today 5/10/13), while going over the pictures i had taken for this inspection, i noticed an anomoly in one of the last shots i took while facing west/north-west.

hey folks, i am not claiming this to be a ufo! for all i know, it is some sort of lens flare or other explainable occurrence, but because it seems to have solidity and it is unlike anything i would usually see in the sky, i thought i'd send it to the experts for further analysis. maybe it's nothing at all, but i'll let you determine that.

i heard nothing...I saw nothing...I felt nothing. i simply found a strange object in my picture and want you to take a look. to be honest, it looks a lot like a drywood termite swarmer (ironic), but a bug would not show up like this unless it was huge, like the size of a car---not to mention, drywood termites don't start their swarming season until september. again, i'm not holding my breath here.

p.S.---i was using my iphone 5 to take the pictures
content.summary: Found anomoly in picture / did not see

content.detailedDescription:
Object reflected sunlight like a mirror, my wife and i were tiring to figure out what we were looking at.  it never occurred to either of us to get a camera.  it just sit against the mountain.  no noise, no movement.  it just sat there.  it just sat there for who knows for how long.  when i returned with a camera, the object was gone.

1. taking the dog out for a toilet run.
2. the mirrored surface.
3. we thought it was a light from the university.
4. it was mirrored, so only by my movement could i get a shape.  no movement.
5. i wish i had my camera so you could see want i saw.
content.summary: Object was just sitting there, no movement against moscow mountain, very bright.

content.detailedDescription: At about 10pm that evening,the wife and i had just stepped out front of our house to let the dogs out when we heard the sound of a helicopter approaching from the east.When the sound from the helicopter grew increasingly louder,we quickly realized that it was flying extremely low over our moderately populated neighborhood.We rushed out to the driveway to witness a "blacked-out"(it did have its red and green tail lights on) military style helicopter in close pursuit of what can only be described as a small(maybe half the size of the helicopter),quiet,translucent craft with what appeared to be a dimly lit orange off-center light.We were able to see the edges of this "craft",and can best describe it as maybe teardrop in shape.In about 30 seconds time,we watched these two vehicles move in a straight line trajectory,from east to west, across the night sky and out of our line of sight.My immediate thought was that what we had just witnessed was clearly an extraterrestrial vehicle being chased/followed by a military aircraft.As i'm sure you can imagine, we were both in utter shock and amazement,and we've spent the last 24 hours scouring the news/internet for any info on this "event".So far,we haven't seen anyone else report this "event",but i can't imagine that we were the only one's to have witnessed this happen due to how low and loud this helicopter was.
content.summary: Small translucent craft chased by a blacked-out military style helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
On may 4, 2013, my wife and i were sitting in our backyard.  at around 4:40 pm i noticed a bright flashing light to the east of us as it came over a hill.
the light was flashing as if a mirror was reflecting a very bright light.  the light was on the side away from the sun.
as it approached it appeared to be a sphere.  the object travelled from the ne to sw.  it was difficult to make out because of the flashing light.
when it travelled further and i was looking at it almost from the rear, it looked like a solid grey sphere.
at first i thought it might be a balloon, however it did not bob or waver and the light was stronger than any strobe i have seen in the daytime.
i could not tell the size - there were no clouds, but it was well below some jet contrails that had recently formed.
we both saw the object and it was like nothing we had seen before.
i wanted to get a camera but there was no time.
i was mostly curious during the event, just trying to figure out what it was.
the object kept travelling on a straight line ne to sw until it disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Sitting in backyard noticed a grey sphere with flashing light pass ne to sw

content.detailedDescription:
In the predawn morning of may 16, 1996: (there were two other witnesses, and i have never reported this before - but now i may be dying, and want this told to someone, whether investigated or not.)
i was out on our brick patio behind the house, with a clear view of 200 degrees or so, from southeast, arcing through west, to northeast. the morning was clear, although there had been some clouds earlier (and before midnight on the 15th). i do not recall the phase or position of the moon. a flash of light to my left, roughly 220 degrees true, (i am a retired submarine navigator)and position angle about 20. the object moved slowly and steadily toward the west, which was from my left to my right, as i had been facing west. 
i could not at that time judge distance or size - but if it had been a ship at sea, i'd have estimated its angle-on-the-bow, based on its direction of travel, to be about starboard 10 to 20. there was nothing under it that i could see. from knowing this area, i know that at that time, the land in that direction was crop-fields for corn and soya, early in the season for either. since that time a few housing developments have been built. 
my first chance to get an idea of size and distance came after several minutes, when the  object flew over the southern end of a long tree-line, which ran south-to-north for about 1.5 miles. the tree-line's closest point to my house is slightly under a mile (land measurements given here). once over the tree-line, i could confirm what before i had known might be an optical illusion:  the course and speed of the object seemed steady, but it was definitely bobbing up and down. the tree-line was very uniform in height - but the craft was bobbing below it and out of sight, and then well above it as it moved. at this point i called my two teen-aged children, and was relieved that when i returned to the patio, the object was still there, moving exactly as before. we watched it until it passed out of our line of sight. i remained outside, and it returned 36 minutes later, reversing its previous path. 
i checked with the night editor of the indianapolis star to ascertain if anyone had reported anything unusual in the sky that night. he said that no one had, and asked me what i had seen. i gave him a brief description, and then i asked him if he thought that it could possibly have been the goodyear blimp, which was in the area to promote the upcoming indianapolis 500, run on memorial day weekend. he said that it didn't sound like a blimp, and then he put me on hold and came back a minute or so later to tell me that the blimp was not aloft, anywhere, at that time. i thanked him and hung up, not leaving my 'phone number or name. 
the nearest i can come to comparing the object to anything familiar, would be to say that in light-pattern, it somewhat resembled a police car's rooftop bank of lights - although the colors were not the same, and the size, which i estimate to be 500+ feet from first-light-to-last-light. most of the time i thought i could make out dark silhouettes beneath the lights, and above it, extending out from each end of the lights both 'fore and aft.  (this does not exclude, say, a saucer-shape, or most shapes - this is merely the way it looked, as it bobbed up and down behind the tree-line and then back again, as if on a rounded or straight course, but seeming always to be moving in roughly a straight line.) but again, i cannot be certain of the silhouettes. then seemed more evident as i looked away, of couse, but the lights obscured any real chance for a good observation of the rest of the object.
content.summary: Sighted object atop and bobbing below treeline 1 mile away, moving west to east - it left sight, then returned- 5 times observed during 3 hours. flashing 4 colors lights - looked random.

content.detailedDescription: In back yard saw object in sky square started taking cell pics went inside to view pics after going back out side again it was gone clouds retained shape but diminished in size tillgone  object also emitted beams of light whear they struck the ground could be detirmed using cell data
content.summary: Just below clouds larg objec stayed went inside to view cell pics came out to take more was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving the whataburger at 11:15pm...Prior to getting on cameron road i noticed a whirring sound and a few seconds later i noticed 2 light-objects moving from the ne toward my location and coming from hi to low elevation.

there were 2 objects moving in a lose and changing formation in relation to eachother...They were descending toward my direction (i stopped the car immediately and got out to observe because of how strange they looked and moved...There was a very subtle wobble or side-to-side motion as they moved along.


they stopped at an altitude between 200-300 feet, judging from the power-line height...They were very low and the whirring sound was very subtle and didn't last long.

they would be pretty easy to miss because they did not give off light rays...They had a clear edge to them but still having an inherent orange illumination.  

as they moved westward above hwy 290 i got back into the car and tried to follow.  somehow, without appearing to speed up they gained altitude and distance quickly...Out of site by the time i reached the access road of hwy 290 from cameron road.  i moved onto 183north hoping to catch another siting of them but that wasn't successful.

my girlfriend was in the car with me.  she heard and saw the whole thing...We have a photo from her phone camera that we will upload soon for the report file.  it clearly shows the 2 orb-like objects.
content.summary: 2 orange/amber objects descended from the ne, hovered at around 250 ft. then ascended gently going west

content.detailedDescription: Large grey object just below clouds three small cloud ball formations at south end of object other small cloud more to front [north] emiting intermitant beams to ground
content.summary: I have pictures on my cell phone

content.detailedDescription: There's a place on my friend's farm that i go to and relax around total nature. i decided to video tape where i was to show my family and friends how blessed i am to be at such peace at this point in my life after living most of my life in turmoil, hurt, incarceration and angst. as i was talking on the video i panned around the entire area to show everyone how peaceful and serene the area i was in was. i was sitting on a storm-downed tree that had landed on another tree, which caused the downed tree to lay horizontally five (5)feet above the ground and over the small creek that the small waterfall made. after filming the area, i leaned back on the vertical tree the downed tree ended up against and relaxed. a few moments later i felt an urge to look over my shoulder. i stared behind me for a minute wondering why i felt this urge. i was in a densely forested area with many trees but with ample distance visage. i looked back there and noticed something different in my vision. five feet behind me and about two feet above my line of sight and one foot to my left shoulder sat a branch. that's when i noticed something was a little more bleary in that spot. i didn't believe what i was seeing so i turned away to look at something else and then back. that's when i saw a distinct shape. i looked directly at it and felt that i saw it looking back at me. i then looked past the shape on both sides and got the outline. i then saw that it was reflecting the daylight and tree leaves around it. i noticed that it had two ears like an owl or house cat and a body that appeared to be like a chicken. i turned away again to make sure i was not hallucinating. i was not. i turned back to it overwhelmed by fear. this time i noticed that the side of the shape had a rounded feathers-like reflection to it. at this point i felt it seem to say, "can you see me? are you looking at me" that's when the tingling fear hit me. i didn't panic on the outside; just on the inside. i was about twenty feet away from the property end of the downed tree. i had walked the length of it to my spot. now i had to walk back down it to get back to the property. i was afraid that if i panicked i would slip off the tree, fall to the ground five feet below and then be attacked by the life form. no one would know where i was nor find me until i rotted. maybe. so, in mortal fear of being grabbed as i made it back along the tree i tried to act normal. i talked to my self just like i was talking while filming the video. i said, "well, time for me to head on back," in hopes of having it think it was a figment of my imagination. i made it off the tree and back over the barbed-wire fence (to keep the cows on the property), grabbed my bike and walked it back to the path. i was afraid that at any time, it would grab me. when i got back to the house told my friend and his daughter what had happened. they humored me. later on i looked at the video and discovered that as i was filming i had turned the camera toward me and talked some more. to my amazement i actually have caught the life form on my video. it is over my left shoulder. i have tape of the "invisible" life form. i would like you all to analyze it and blow it up if possible. this is by far the strangest thing i have ever witnessed. i would be happy to show you the entire video and the place this all occurred. i have included a blow-up pic for now. thank you.
content.summary: Relaxing on a downed tree over small creek and felt its presence. perched on branch 5 feet behind me.

content.detailedDescription:
The observation was made while working in the garden. the time was 3:00pm and the object was a pointer finger (from suns center) at one o'clock. the object was visable for two hours and ended up at the 11 position at five o'clock and two pointer fingers from the suns center.

during this time period the object turned color (blue,orange,green) white pieces drifted out of the object. at one point two  identical objects sped past.The object was a bright white, soft edges, very slow moving,round, and white. a bright white, like viewing a first magnitute star in daylight. it moved in a clockwise direction starting at 1:00 and last observed at the 11:00 position. photographs show six objects.  

two airforce fighter aircraft flew by as did a commercial passenger plane.

sight was lost when cloud cover moved in.

the object was observed when our grandson looked up and wanted to known whats that. our reaction was to grab cameras and take pictues and sit and watch. told neighbors to look at the objects.
content.summary: Observation of white disc in sky.

content.detailedDescription: On 5/7/13 around 9:00 i was outside looking for ufos and using a high powerd laser beam shooting it into the sky at first there were several starlike orbs flying around the sky then off to the left of me a huge glowing craft made of light appeared . flowing about 20 ft off the ground it hoverd the then slowly desenended to the ground. i onlyhad a phone to record with and it somehow got turned on to stencil mode  but i still maneged to film it. i then ran into my friends house to tell him and his girlfriend to come look when we got back outside it. became so bright it looked like a little sun! it was so bright and begain eminting some auar of light in a pyramidal shape around it.  i wasnt going to let this chance of a lifetime get away so i started walking, strait for it in the total darkness my friends became worried and yelled for me to come back. they,were rhly afard  so i came back. i told them to go inside and once more i headed for the craft . then i watched it, totaly disapiar. then on the mountain behind us to buge red ords of light lit up and started flying right towars me as they got over head i sbot the laser at tbem and they bothe vrew extreamly bright then disapired
content.summary: Glowing ufo landed i filmed it then told my ftiends to come ser

content.detailedDescription: At about 2:30 am, a disk like craft was seen flying in a straight line from se to nw at about 30 to 40 mph. the craft was round in shape, a dull silver color and had a large central light on the bottom. around the outer edge of the craft, were white and blue lights that flashed on and off sequentially. the craft made no noise and and did not change direction. no pictures were taken.
content.summary: Large disk craft with one central light and blue/ white lights flashed sequentially around craft, flew from sw to nw .

content.detailedDescription:
At about 3:30am, animals (dogs cats) reacted to a humming sound and attracted the attention of the human occupants of the building where a low humming sound was heard coming from above. the witness, not me, (a retired nurse and avid ufo fan,) went out side and looking up saw a flattened cigar shaped craft with a gold colored rear end. witness tried to take pictures and each time the camera failed to operate. each time she could get the camera to work it would fail. but she finely got it to work and took two pictures the moment
the second picture was taken, the craft vanished to the sw. 
later, it was discovered that the the sighting was longer than at first thought. their computer crashed and came back up after the craft left. the witnesses (husband and wife) examined the computer and discovered that it was down up to two hours. another witness, said she was a sleep and told me that she was abducted and recalled being aboard the craft and passing a tall blonde haired man in a strange clothes. 
   the reaction of the animals was the dogs (across the street and all out side was wild barking and whining. the cats all scampered to the window and stared at the object.
content.summary: A flattened cigar shaped craft hovered over four story building from 10 minutes to two hours.

content.detailedDescription: My son took some photos of the rainbow like rings around the sun, or "sundogs" with his cellphone camera, 4shots in a row. as the sun was too bright to look at directly he simply held the camera out of the truck window and clicked off 4 shots . when he looked at them later he could see the object, and that it moved significantly in respect to it's position adjacent to the sun. he has the photos on his phone, they clearly show something, possibly with a halo of it's own . the photos are not enhanced in any way and should be time/date stamped and location. i can e-mail them if need bei
content.summary: Only saw after viewing photos taken of "sundogs"
